response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. I understand its significance to you, valued at $1,500,000. My proposal is to offer it to you at a price that reflects its true worth and allows us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I kindly invite you to consider purchasing this product for $1,250,000. This offer not only ensures a fair transaction but also leaves room for negotiation if needed. Let's work together to make this a seamless process. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1250000}
